SEARCH
Package com.landawn.abacus.util

Class Wrapper<T>

java.lang.Object
com.landawn.abacus.util.Wrapper<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the object that this wrapper will hold.
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Immutable
@Immutable public abstract class Wrapper<T> extends Object implements Immutable
Once the object is stored in a Set or Map, it should not be modified, otherwise, the behavior is undefined.

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static <T> Wrapper<T> of(T array)
      Returns a new instance of Wrapper for the given array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the array elements.
      Parameters:
      array - The array to be wrapped.
      Returns:
      A Wrapper instance for the given array.

    • of

      public static <T> Wrapper<T> of(T value, ToIntFunction<? super T> hashFunction, BiPredicate<? super T,? super T> equalsFunction) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new instance of Wrapper for the given value, using the provided hash function and equals function. The hash function is used to calculate the hash code of the wrapped value, and the equals function is used to compare the wrapped value with other objects. This method is useful when the wrapped value's natural hash code and equals methods are not suitable. For example: array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value to be wrapped.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be wrapped.
      hashFunction - The function to calculate the hash code of the wrapped value.
      equalsFunction - The function to compare the wrapped value with other objects.
      Returns:
      A Wrapper instance for the given value.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the hashFunction or equalsFunction is null.

    • of

      public static <T> Wrapper<T> of(T value, ToIntFunction<? super T> hashFunction, BiPredicate<? super T,? super T> equalsFunction, Function<? super T,String> toStringFunction) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new instance of Wrapper for the given value, using the provided hash function and equals function. The hash function is used to calculate the hash code of the wrapped value, and the equals function is used to compare the wrapped value with other objects. This method is useful when the wrapped value's natural hash code and equals methods are not suitable. For example: array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value to be wrapped.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be wrapped.
      hashFunction - The function to calculate the hash code of the wrapped value.
      equalsFunction - The function to compare the wrapped value with other objects.
      Returns:
      A Wrapper instance for the given value.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the hashFunction or equalsFunction or toStringFunction is null.
